IX.i.3.D.2.b
.
Cases That Require Additional Development
In some cases, particularly those involving nursing home fees, additional development may be necessary to determine if the claimant will be reimbursed for some of the medical expenses, since only UMEs are allowed.
Use
VA Form 21P-8416
to obtain the beneficiary’s statement as to the level of UMEs.
References
:  For more information on
developing for nursing home fees, see
M21-1, Part IX, Subpart iii, 1.G.3.j
, and
the required fields for
VA Form 21P-8416
, see
M21-1, Part IX, Subpart iii, 1.G.4.c-e
.
